name: Extension
title: CS Extension
notes:
**Note 1**: Plasmacytomas (9731 and 9734) and Multiple Myeloma (9732) have been moved to the MyelomaPlasmaCellDisorder schema effective with CS version 2: 0203

**Note 2**: For histologies listed in code 100 it is possible to have lymph node involvement; however, at this time, lymph node invovement for these histologies is not collected.
rows:

(Single/solitary/unifocal/isolated):

    Mast cell sarcoma (9740)
    Malignant histiocytosis (9750)
    Langerhans cell histiocytosis (9751)
    Histiocytic sarcoma (9755)
    Langerhans cell sarcoma (9756)
    Dendritic cell sarcoma (9757, 9758)
    Myeloid sarcoma (9930)

Systemic disease

(All histologies including those in 100)
